Text.text: Panels below illustrate the four standard margin sizes 'tiny', 'small', 'medium' and 'large'.
This panel uses margin class 'sapUiTinyMargin' to clear a 8px (0.5rem) space all around.
Since panels have a default width of 100%, horizontal margins are not displayed appropriately. Therefore we need to set the panel's 'width' property to 'auto'.
This panel uses margin class 'sapUiSmallMargin' to clear a 16px (1rem) space all around.
This panel uses margin class 'sapUiMediumMargin' to clear a 32px (2rem) space all around.
This panel uses margin class 'sapUiLargeMargin' to clear a 48px (3rem) space all around.
Each of the panels above has a margin all around. Please notice that this margins do not add up. Instead, they 'collapse'.
